infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Bandstands would like to access your camera to allow you to scan QR Codes. We do not store or share any data.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Bandstands would like to use your current location to direct you to the bandstand locations. We do not store or share any location data.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: Bandstands would like to stop your phone going to sleep while you search for a location.
